meanings.sent1: I am asterisking important information in my notes.
meanings.sent2: She is asterisking the key points in the document.
meanings.sent3: The teacher kept asterisking the mistakes in red pen.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like asterisking the room with sunshine.
meanings.sent5: Asterisking the map made it easier to find the treasure.

meanings.definition: To indicate by means of an asterisk.
meanings.sent1: They are asterisking the correct answers in the quiz.
meanings.sent2: The editor is asterisking the errors for correction.
meanings.sent3: Asterisking the recipe made it look more professional.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter asterisked the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The stars in the sky were asterisking the night beautifully.

meanings.definition: The act of adding an asterisk to something.
meanings.sent1: The asterisking of the text helped clarify the meaning.
meanings.sent2: His asterisking of the list made it easier to read.
meanings.sent3: The sudden asterisking of the menu caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The asterisking of her speech added emphasis to her words.
meanings.sent5: The asterisking of the contract highlighted the important clauses.
